caption.p: Phylogenetic tree showing clusters that contained the study sequences (Swiss men who have sex with men [MSM] sequences). Clusters were defined as monophyletic trees with â‰¥70% bootstrap support value. The full tree (from which this one is derived, Supplementary Figure 1) was computed using RAxML with 100 replicates and a general time reversible model with invariant sites and gamma-distributed substitution rates.
